Analyzer.Title: Add braces (when expression spans over multiple lines).
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add braces to {0} (when expression spans over multiple lines).

Analyzer.Title: Add braces to if-else (when expression spans over multiple lines).
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add braces to if-else (when expression spans over multiple lines).

Sample.Before: if (condition) // RCS1003 WhenTrue( x, y); else WhenFalse( x, y);

Analyzer.Title: Merge else clause with nested if statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Merge else clause with nested if statement.

Analyzer.Title: Use explicit type instead of 'var' (when the type is not obvious).
Use explicit type instead of 'var' (foreach variable).
Use 'var' instead of explicit type (when the type is obvious).
Use explicit type instead of 'var' (when the type is obvious).
Avoid implicitly-typed array.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Declare explicit type when creating an array.

Analyzer.Title: Avoid multiline expression body.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Expand expression body with multiline expression.

Sample.Before: public string Foo { get { return _foo; } set { _foo = value; } } // RCS1024

Analyzer.Title: Format each enum member on a separate line.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Format each enum member on a separate line.

Sample.Before: public enum Foo { A, B, C, } // RCS1025

Analyzer.Title: Format each statement on a separate line.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Format each statement on a separate line.

Analyzer.Title: Format embedded statement on a separate line.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Format embedded statement on a separate line.

Analyzer.Title: Format switch section's statement on a separate line.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Format switch section's statement on a separate line.

Analyzer.Title: Format binary operator on next line.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Format binary operator on next line.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line after embedded statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line after embedded statement.

Analyzer.Title: Remove 'partial' modifier from type with a single part.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove 'partial' modifier from type with a single part.

Analyzer.Title: Remove original exception from throw statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove original exception from throw statement.

Analyzer.Title: Rename private field according to camel case with underscore.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Rename private field to camel case with underscore.

Analyzer.Title: Asynchronous method name should end with 'Async'.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add suffix 'Async' to asynchronous method name.

Analyzer.Title: Non-asynchronous method name should not end with 'Async'.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove suffix 'Async' from non-asynchronous method name.

Analyzer.Title: Use lambda expression instead of anonymous method.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use lambda expression instead of anonymous method.

Analyzer.Title: Add argument list to object creation expression.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add argument list to object creation expression.

Sample.Before: object x = condition ? WhenTrue() : WhenFalse(); // RCS1051

Analyzer.Title: Replace foreach statement with for statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Replace foreach statement with for statement.

Analyzer.Title: Merge local declaration with return statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Merge local declaration with return statement.

Analyzer.Title: Avoid semicolon at the end of declaration.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove semicolon from the end of declaration.

Analyzer.Title: Avoid usage of using alias directive.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Avoid usage of using alias directive.

Analyzer.Title: Avoid locking on publicly accessible instance.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Lock on private field instead of locking on '{0}'.

Analyzer.Title: Declare each type in separate file.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Declare each type in separate file.

Analyzer.Title: Merge if statement with nested if statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Merge if statement with nested if statement.

Analyzer.Title: Avoid interpolated string with no interpolation.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove '$' from interpolated string with no interpolation.

Analyzer.Title: Avoid usage of do statement to create an infinite loop.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use while statement to create an infinite loop.

Analyzer.Title: Avoid usage of for statement to create an infinite loop.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use while statement to create an infinite loop.

Analyzer.Title: Avoid usage of while statement to create an inifinite loop.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use for statement to create an infinite loop.

Analyzer.Title: Remove argument list from object creation expression.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove argument list from object creation expression.

Analyzer.Title: Replace if statement with return statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Replace if statement with return statement.

Analyzer.Title: Avoid empty catch clause that catches System.Exception.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Avoid empty catch clause that catches System.Exception.

Sample.Before: IEnumerable<Foo> x = items.Where(f => f is Foo).Cast<Foo>(); // RCS1077

Analyzer.Title: Throwing of new NotImplementedException.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Implement the functionality instead of throwing new NotImplementedException.

Sample.After: private string s; private string s2;

Analyzer.Title: Use coalesce expression instead of conditional expression.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use coalesce expression instead of conditional expression.

Analyzer.Title: Use carriage return + linefeed as newline.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use carriage return + linefeed as newline.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line after last statement in do statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line after last statement in do statement.

Analyzer.Title: Declare using directive on top level.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Declare using directive on top level.

Analyzer.Title: Use bitwise operation instead of calling 'HasFlag'.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use bitwise operation instead of calling 'HasFlag'.

Analyzer.Title: Avoid 'null' on the left side of a binary expression.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: 'null' should be on the right side of a binary expression.

Analyzer.Title: Default label should be the last label in a switch section.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Move default label to the last position in a switch section.

Analyzer.Title: Format documentation summary on a single line.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Format documentation summary on a single line.

Analyzer.Title: Format documentation summary on multiple lines.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Format documentation summary on multiple lines.

Sample.Before: bool x = condition ? true : false; // RCS1104

Analyzer.Title: Add 'static' modifier to all partial class declarations.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add 'static' modifier to all partial class declarations.

Analyzer.Title: Add braces to switch section with multiple statements.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add braces to switch section with multiple statements.

Sample.Before: IEnumerable<string> x = items.Where(f => Foo(f)).Where(f => Bar(f)); // RCS1112

Analyzer.Title: Replace yield/return statement with expression statement.
Add break statement to switch section.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add break statement to switch section.

Analyzer.Title: Add return statement that returns default value.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add return statement that returns default value.

Sample.Before: string s = "a"; // RCS1118 string s2 = s + "b";
Sample.After: const string s = "a"; string s2 = s + "b";

Analyzer.Title: Add parentheses according to operator precedence.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add parentheses according to operator precedence.

Analyzer.Title: Bitwise operation on enum without Flags attribute.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Bitwise operation on enum without Flags attribute.

Analyzer.Title: Declare enum member with zero value (when enum has FlagsAttribute).
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Declare enum member with zero value (when enum has FlagsAttribute).

Sample.After: [Flags] public enum Foo { None = 0, A = 1, B = 2 }

Analyzer.Title: Merge switch sections with equivalent content.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Merge switch sections with equivalent content.

Analyzer.Title: Add documentation comment to publicly visible type or member.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add documentation comment to publicly visible type or member.

Analyzer.Title: Add summary element to documentation comment.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add summary element to documentation comment.

Analyzer.Title: Add type parameter to documentation comment.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add type parameter to documentation comment.

Sample.Before:
string s = null;
string s2 = s as string; // RCS1145

Analyzer.Title: Member type must match overriden member type.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Member type must match overriden member type.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line after closing brace.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line after closing brace.

Sample.Before: public enum Foo // RCS1154 { D = 4, B = 2, A = 1, C = 3 }
Sample.After: public enum Foo { A = 1, B = 2, C = 3, D = 4 }

Analyzer.Title: Use string.Length instead of comparison with empty string.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use string.Length instead of comparison with empty string.

Analyzer.Title: Composite enum value contains undefined flag.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Composite enum value contains undefined flag {0}.

Sample.Before: [Flags] public enum Foo { None = 0, A = 1, B = 2, C = 4, D = 8, X = 17 // RCS1157 }

Analyzer.Title: Static member in generic type should use a type parameter.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Static member in generic type should use a type parameter.

Analyzer.Title: Abstract type should not have public constructors.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Abstract type should not have public constructors.

Analyzer.Title: Enum member should declare explicit value.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Enum member should declare explicit value.

Analyzer.Title: Unused parameter.
Analyzer.Summary: Parameter is not reported when its name consists of underscore(s).

Analyzer.Title: Unconstrained type parameter checked for null.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Unconstrained type parameter checked for null.

Analyzer.Title: Value type object is never equal to null.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Value type object is never equal to null.

Analyzer.Title: Overriding member cannot change access modifiers.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Overriding member cannot change access modifiers.

Analyzer.Title: Parameter name differs from base name.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Parameter name '{0}' differs from base name '{1}'.

Sample.Before: public object Foo { get; private set; } // RCS1170

Analyzer.Title: Use coalesce expression instead of if.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use coalesce expression instead of if.

Analyzer.Title: Use 'var' instead of explicit type (when the type is not obvious).
Use 'var' instead of explicit type (in foreach).

Sample.Before: public string Value { get; } // Gets a value. // RCS1181

Analyzer.Title: Format initializer with single expression on single line.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Format initializer with single expression on single line.

Analyzer.Title: Format conditional expression (format ? and : on next line).
Use Regex instance instead of static method.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use Regex instance instead of static method.

Sample.Before: public string Foo { get; set; } = null; // RCS1188

Analyzer.Title: Declare enum value as combination of names.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Declare enum value as combination of names.

Sample.Before: [Flags] public enum Foo { None = 0, A = 1, B = 2, C = 4, ABC = 7 // RCS1191 }
Sample.After: [Flags] public enum Foo { None = 0, A = 1, B = 2, C = 4, ABC = A | B | C }

Analyzer.Title: Use regular string literal instead of verbatim string literal.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use regular string literal instead of verbatim string literal.

Analyzer.Title: Call extension method as instance method.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Call extension method as instance method.

Sample.Before: var x = Enumerable.Select(items, f => f.ToString()) // RCS1196

Analyzer.Title: Avoid unnecessary boxing of value type.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Avoid unnecessary boxing of value type.

Sample.Before: var x = items.OrderBy(f => f.Surname).OrderBy(f => f.Name); // RCS1200

Analyzer.Title: Reorder named arguments according to the order of parameters.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Reorder named arguments according to the order of parameters.

Analyzer.Title: Use conditional access instead of conditional expression.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use conditional access instead of conditional expression.

Analyzer.Title: Use method group instead of anonymous function.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use method group instead of anonymous function.

Analyzer.Title: Return Task.FromResult instead of returning null.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Return Task.FromResult instead of returning null.

Analyzer.Title: Expression is always equal to true/false.
